languages.text: {n}Крепко сжав жемчужно-белыми зубами новую самокрутку с лхо, Пощада спокойно отвечает:{/n} "Я не идиот и не собираюсь спорить с Вольным Торговцем и заряженным автопистолетом".
{n}Clamping a new lho roll-up between his pearly-white teeth, Mercy coolly replies,{/n} "I am not an idiot. I am not going to argue with a Rogue Trader and a loaded autopistol."
languages.original_text: {n}Крепко сжав жемчужно-белыми зубами новую самокрутку с лхо, Пощада спокойно отвечает:{/n} "Я не идиот и не собираюсь спорить с Вольным Торговцем и заряженным автопистолетом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Clamping a new lho roll-up between his pearly-white teeth, Mercy coolly replies,{/n} "I am not an idiot. I am not going to argue with a Rogue Trader and a loaded autopistol."
traits.speaker: Mercy

traits.locale_text: {n}Clamping a new lho roll-up between his pearly-white teeth, Mercy coolly replies,{/n} "I am not an idiot. I am not going to argue with a Rogue Trader and a loaded autopistol."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}悯慈露出了如同珍珠般洁白的牙齿，咬住了一支新的麻烟，冷冷地回答道。{/n}“我可不是白痴。我不打算和行商浪人，还有一把上了膛的自动手枪争论。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clamping a new lho roll-up between his pearly-white teeth, Mercy coolly replies,{/n} "I am not an idiot. I am not going to argue with a Rogue Trader and a loaded autopistol."

traits.locale_text: {n}悯慈露出了如同珍珠般洁白的牙齿，咬住了一支新的麻烟，冷冷地回答道。{/n}“我可不是白痴。我不打算和行商浪人，还有一把上了膛的自动手枪争论。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}真珠のような白い歯に新しいアイホを一口くわえ、マーシーは冷静にこう答えた。{/n}「私は愚か者ではありませんからな。自由開拓者と、弾の込められたオートピストルと議論するつもりはありませんよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Clamping a new lho roll-up between his pearly-white teeth, Mercy coolly replies,{/n} "I am not an idiot. I am not going to argue with a Rogue Trader and a loaded autopistol."

traits.locale_text: {n}真珠のような白い歯に新しいアイホを一口くわえ、マーシーは冷静にこう答えた。{/n}「私は愚か者ではありませんからな。自由開拓者と、弾の込められたオートピストルと議論するつもりはありませんよ」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Sujetando un pitillo de lho recién liado entre sus dientes perlados, Mercy responde con frialdad:{/n} «No soy idiota. No tengo intención de discutir con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente a punta de pistola automática».
languages.original_text: {n}Clamping a new lho roll-up between his pearly-white teeth, Mercy coolly replies,{/n} "I am not an idiot. I am not going to argue with a Rogue Trader and a loaded autopistol."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sujetando un pitillo de lho recién liado entre sus dientes perlados, Mercy responde con frialdad:{/n} «No soy idiota. No tengo intención de discutir con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente a punta de pistola automática».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Mercy place un nouveau lho roulé entre ses dents nacrées et répond froidement :{/n} « Je ne suis pas stupide. Je ne vais pas me disputer avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et un pistolet-mitrailleur chargé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Clamping a new lho roll-up between his pearly-white teeth, Mercy coolly replies,{/n} "I am not an idiot. I am not going to argue with a Rogue Trader and a loaded autopistol."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercy place un nouveau lho roulé entre ses dents nacrées et répond froidement :{/n} « Je ne suis pas stupide. Je ne vais pas me disputer avec {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et un pistolet-mitrailleur chargé. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Mercy macht sich wieder eine Lho-Zigarette an und zeigt seine perlweißen Zähne. Dann antwortet er kühl:{/n} "Ich bin doch kein Idiot. Ich werde mich nicht mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} streiten, {mf|der|die} mit geladener Maschinenpistole vor mir steht."
languages.original_text: {n}Clamping a new lho roll-up between his pearly-white teeth, Mercy coolly replies,{/n} "I am not an idiot. I am not going to argue with a Rogue Trader and a loaded autopistol."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercy macht sich wieder eine Lho-Zigarette an und zeigt seine perlweißen Zähne. Dann antwortet er kühl:{/n} "Ich bin doch kein Idiot. Ich werde mich nicht mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} streiten, {mf|der|die} mit geladener Maschinenpistole vor mir steht."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Yeni bir sarma lihoyu inci beyazı dişlerinin arasına sıkıştıran Merhamet, soğuk bir şekilde yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Aptal değilim. Bir Hür Tacir'le ve ateşlenmeye hazır bir ototabancayla tartışmayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Clamping a new lho roll-up between his pearly-white teeth, Mercy coolly replies,{/n} "I am not an idiot. I am not going to argue with a Rogue Trader and a loaded autopistol."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yeni bir sarma lihoyu inci beyazı dişlerinin arasına sıkıştıran Merhamet, soğuk bir şekilde yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Aptal değilim. Bir Hür Tacir'le ve ateşlenmeye hazır bir ototabancayla tartışacak değilim."
traits.speaker: Mercy
